headline: United Rentals Expands Shareholder Returns With New Buyback And Dividend Lift
summary: United Rentals (NYSE:URI) announced a new US$5 billion share repurchase program authorized by its Board of Directors. The buyback program has no expiration date, allowing the company flexibility in the timing and size of future repurchases. The company also approved a 10% dividend increase, reinforcing its focus on shareholder returns. United Rentals, a major equipment rental provider serving construction, industrial and infrastructure customers, sits at the center of demand for rented...
